title: Star Guardians
body: When are the Star Guardians comin out?

replies.body:
They come out 8th September :)
[Patch 7.17 notes](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-717-notes#patch-upcoming-events)

I can't wait to get Star Guardian Ahri <3

today is the 6th. he said the 8th.

8th-6th=2
It's the 7th in Australia, time zones should be removed, god pls fix
What are you smoking and where can I get some? It was the 6th when you posted this comment.
Awww yeh thank you I'm getting the Ezreal
Just got my Ahri. It's all soooo pretty <333

10 Star Guardian Skins. 1 Melee Champion. What a time to be a Jungle Main.

EDIT: AND she's only a decent Jungler in 3v3.
